menu.title: Beyaynet
menu.description: A traditional Ethiopian vegetarian platter served on injera with an assortment of lentils, stews, and vegetables.

menu.title: Burger
menu.description: A grilled beef burger with melted cheese, fresh vegetables, and house sauce in a soft toasted bun.

menu.title: Shiro
menu.description: A spicy Ethiopian chickpea stew, often served with injera and enjoyed as a hearty vegetarian meal.

menu.title: Pizza
menu.description: Classic Italian-style pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and your choice of toppings.

menu.title: Kitfo
menu.description: A beloved Ethiopian dish made with minced raw or lightly cooked beef mixed with spiced butter and mitmita.

menu.title: French fries
menu.description: Golden, crispy French fries served hot and seasoned with a pinch of salt.
